show.title: REVENGE OF XXL HUSBAND
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/AEyVCQ
show.description: When a wife leaves her husband for someone new, she never expects him to return transformed—fit, confident, and unrecognizable. Drawn to the handsome stranger, she falls in love all over again… unaware he’s the man she once discarded. But this time, his heart belongs to the woman who stood by him in his darkest days—and together, they serve revenge cold.
